followup_2.subject: 3 quick wins to improve conversions
followup_2.preview_text: Here are 3 things most sites can improve right away
followup_2.html_body:
Hi {{name}},

If you're curious, here are 3 quick things most sites can improve right away:

1. Reduce page load time

Optimize images & enable caching ‚Äî faster sites convert better

2. Clear call-to-action

Make it obvious what visitors should do next

3. Automated lead capture

Set up automated follow-ups to nurture leads

If you'd like, we can walk through these on a 15-minute call:
